Package com.hexaforce.warzone.utils

Class Command

java.lang.Object
com.hexaforce.warzone.utils.Command
public class Command extends Object
Represents a command entered by the user and provides methods to process and extract information from it.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    String
    d_command
    The raw command entered by the player.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Command(String p_command)
    Creates a Command object with the given input command, removing extra spaces.

      public String d_command
      The raw command entered by the player.

  • Constructor Details

    • Command

      public Command(String p_command)
      Creates a Command object with the given input command, removing extra spaces.
      Parameters:
      p_command - The input command provided by the player.

  • Method Details

    • getRootCommand

      public String getRootCommand()
      Retrieves the root command (the first part) from the series of commands entered by the player.
      Returns:
      The root command as a string.

    • getOperationsAndArguments

      public List<Map<String,String>> getOperationsAndArguments()
      Processes the command to extract a list of operations and their arguments.
      Returns:
      A list of operation and argument pairs as maps.

    • checkRequiredKeysPresent

      public boolean checkRequiredKeysPresent(String p_key, Map<String,String> p_inputMap)
      Checks if the specified key is present in the input map and has a non-empty value.
      Parameters:
      p_key - The key to be checked in the input map.
      p_inputMap - The input map to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the key is present and its value is non-empty, otherwise false.

    • displayStartupCommands

      public static String displayStartupCommands()
      Will Display all commands which can run on current Phase

    • displayIssueOrderCommands

      public static String displayIssueOrderCommands()
      Will Display all commands which can run on current Phase
